panels.description: To help you find rule name of your peak alert rules and validate the connection

defaults.noValue: Did not found Kubernetes Rules from last scan

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Rules
JOIN
    Providers ON Rules.providerId = Providers.ID
WHERE
    Providers.name = 'kubernetes';

panels.title: Retrieved Kubernetes Rules From Last Scan

panels.description: Your CPU limits & request configuration

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    '${CPULimit}' AS "CPU Limit Total",
    '${CPURequest}' AS "CPU Request Total"

panels.title: CPU Limits & Request Configuration

panels.description: Your Memory limits & request configuration

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS "Memory Limit Total",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS "Memory Request Total",
    Scans.created_at AS "Latest Update"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    AND Scans.created_at = (
        SELECT MAX(Scans.created_at)
        FROM Scans
        JOIN Resources ON Scans.resourceId = Resources.ID
        JOIN Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
        WHERE
            Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
            AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    );

panels.title: Memory Limits & Request Configuration

panels.description: CPU usage history for selected pod

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS "CPU Usage",
    Scans.created_at AS "Time",
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at;

panels.title: Memory Usage for ${Pod}

panels.description:
A score to resume the optimization of your CPU limits & request versus your average usage.

OptimizationScore = (1 - ((distance_request + distance_limit) / 2)) * 99

targets.rawSql:
WITH OptimizationStats AS (
    SELECT
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) AS CPUUsage,
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS CPULimitTotal,
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPURequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS CPURequestTotal,
        (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) - CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPURequestTotal' AS NUMERIC)) AS Range,

        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS norm_usage,
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPURequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS norm_request,

        ABS((CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)) - 
            (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPURequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) AS distance_request,
        ABS(1 - (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) AS distance_limit,

        (ABS((CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)) - 
             (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPURequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) + 
             ABS(1 - (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)))) / 2 AS combined_distance,

        (1 - ((ABS((CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)) - 
              (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPURequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) + 
              ABS(1 - (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)))) / 2)) * 99 AS OptimizationScore

    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
)
SELECT optimizationscore
FROM OptimizationStats;

panels.title: CPU Optimization Score

panels.description:
A score to resume the optimization of your Memory limits & request versus your average usage.

OptimizationScore = (1 - ((distance_request + distance_limit) / 2)) * 99

targets.rawSql:
WITH OptimizationStats AS (
    SELECT
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) AS MemoryUsage,
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS MemoryLimitTotal,
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS MemoryRequestTotal,
        (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) - CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS NUMERIC)) AS Range,
        
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS norm_usage,
        CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC) AS norm_request,
        
        ABS((CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)) - 
            (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) AS distance_request,
        ABS(1 - (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) AS distance_limit,

        (ABS((CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)) - 
             (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) + 
             ABS(1 - (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)))) / 2 AS combined_distance,

        (1 - ((ABS((CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)) - 
              (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC))) + 
              ABS(1 - (CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC) / CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS NUMERIC)))) / 2)) * 99 AS OptimizationScore

    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
)

SELECT optimizationscore
FROM OptimizationStats;

panels.title: Memory Optimization Score

panels.description: CPU maximum, minimum and average usage over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    MIN(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Min Usage",
    AVG(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Avg Usage",
    MAX(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Max Usage"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}';

panels.title: CPU for ${Pod}

panels.description: Kexa CPU peak alerts for selected pods

defaults.noValue: No CPU Peak Alerts for this pod

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Scans.created_at AS "Scan time"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Scans.error = true
    AND
    (Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}')
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at
DESC;

panels.title: Peak Memory Alerts with rule '${MemoryRule}'

panels.description: CPU Deviation & Range of average versus maximum & minimum

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageStats AS (
    SELECT
        MIN(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS MinUsage,
        MAX(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS MaxUsage,
        AVG(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS AvgUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
)
SELECT
    (ABS(AvgUsage - MinUsage) + ABS(MaxUsage - AvgUsage)) / 2 AS "Avg Deviation",
    MaxUsage - MinUsage AS "Min Max Range"
FROM
    UsageStats;

panels.title: Deviation & Range

panels.description: Memory Deviation & Range of average versus maximum & minimum

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageStats AS (
    SELECT
        MIN(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS MinUsage,
        MAX(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS MaxUsage,
        AVG(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS AvgUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
)
SELECT
    (ABS(AvgUsage - MinUsage) + ABS(MaxUsage - AvgUsage)) / 2 AS "Avg Deviation",
    MaxUsage - MinUsage AS "Min Max Range"
FROM
    UsageStats;

panels.title: Deviation & Range

panels.description: CPU usage average week heatmap (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageData AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at) AS day_of_week,
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS hour_of_day,
        (Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage')::float AS CPUUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        day_of_week,
        hour_of_day,
        COUNT(CPUUsage) AS count_usage,
        SUM(CPUUsage) AS total_usage,
        AVG(CPUUsage) AS avg_cpu_usage
    FROM
        UsageData
    GROUP BY
        day_of_week,
        hour_of_day
)
SELECT
    day_of_week AS day,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 23 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "23:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 22 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "22:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 21 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "21:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 20 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "20:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 19 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "19:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 18 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "18:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 17 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "17:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 16 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "16:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 15 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "15:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 14 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "14:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 13 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "13:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 12 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "12:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 11 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "11:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 10 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "10:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 9 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "09:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 8 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "08:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 7 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "07:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 6 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "06:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 5 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "05:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 4 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "04:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 3 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "03:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 2 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "02:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 1 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "01:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 0 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "00:00 H"
FROM
    AggregatedData
GROUP BY
    day_of_week
ORDER BY
    day_of_week;

panels.title: CPU Usage per Hour / Week day (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH HourlyUsage AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS "Hour",
        SUM((Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage')::numeric) AS "Total CPU Usage"
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    GROUP BY
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at)
)
SELECT
    "Hour"
FROM
    HourlyUsage
ORDER BY
    "Total CPU Usage" DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: CPU Peak Hour (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH HourlyUsage AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS "Hour",
        SUM((Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage')::numeric) AS "Total CPU Usage"
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    GROUP BY
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at)
)
SELECT
    "Hour"
FROM
    HourlyUsage
ORDER BY
    "Total CPU Usage" ASC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: CPU Bottom Hour (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageData AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at) AS day_of_week,
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS hour_of_day,
        (Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage')::float AS CPUUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        day_of_week,
        AVG(CPUUsage) AS avg_cpu_usage
    FROM
        UsageData
    GROUP BY
        day_of_week
)
SELECT
    day_of_week AS day,
    avg_cpu_usage
FROM
    AggregatedData
ORDER BY
    avg_cpu_usage DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: CPU Peak Day (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageData AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at) AS day_of_week,
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS hour_of_day,
        (Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage')::float AS CPUUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        day_of_week,
        AVG(CPUUsage) AS avg_cpu_usage
    FROM
        UsageData
    GROUP BY
        day_of_week
)
SELECT
    day_of_week AS day,
    avg_cpu_usage
FROM
    AggregatedData
ORDER BY
    avg_cpu_usage ASC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: CPU Bottom Day (all time / selected pod)

panels.description: All kexa memory & CPU peak alerts (All Data)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->'metadata'->>'namespace' AS "Namespace",
    Rules.name AS "Rule Name",
    Scans.created_at AS "Scan time"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}' OR Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at
DESC;

panels.title: Peak CPU & Memory Alerts (All Data)

targets.rawSql:
WITH HourlyUsage AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS "Hour",
        SUM((Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage')::numeric) AS "Total Memory Usage"
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    GROUP BY
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at)
)
SELECT
    "Hour"
FROM
    HourlyUsage
ORDER BY
    "Total Memory Usage" DESC
LIMIT 1;

    JOIN

panels.title: Memory Bottom Hour (all time / selected pod)

panels.description: Memory usage average week heatmap (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageData AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at) AS day_of_week,
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS hour_of_day,
        (Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage')::float AS MemoryUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        day_of_week,
        hour_of_day,
        COUNT(MemoryUsage) AS count_usage,
        SUM(MemoryUsage) AS total_usage,
        AVG(MemoryUsage) AS avg_cpu_usage
    FROM
        UsageData
    GROUP BY
        day_of_week,
        hour_of_day
)
SELECT
    day_of_week AS day,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 23 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "23:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 22 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "22:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 21 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "21:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 20 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "20:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 19 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "19:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 18 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "18:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 17 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "17:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 16 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "16:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 15 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "15:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 14 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "14:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 13 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "13:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 12 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "12:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 11 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "11:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 10 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "10:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 9 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "09:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 8 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "08:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 7 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "07:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 6 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "06:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 5 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "05:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 4 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "04:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 3 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "03:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 2 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "02:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 1 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "01:00 H",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN hour_of_day = 0 THEN avg_cpu_usage END), 0) AS "00:00 H"
FROM
    AggregatedData
GROUP BY
    day_of_week
ORDER BY
    day_of_week;

panels.title: Memory Usage per Hour / Week day (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageData AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at) AS day_of_week,
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS hour_of_day,
        (Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage')::float AS MemoryUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        day_of_week,
        AVG(MemoryUsage) AS avg_memory_usage
    FROM
        UsageData
    GROUP BY
        day_of_week
)
SELECT
    day_of_week AS day,
    avg_memory_usage
FROM
    AggregatedData
ORDER BY
    avg_memory_usage DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Memory Peak Day (all time / selected pod)

targets.rawSql:
WITH UsageData AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at) AS day_of_week,
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS hour_of_day,
        (Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage')::float AS MemoryUsage
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        day_of_week,
        AVG(MemoryUsage) AS avg_memory_usage
    FROM
        UsageData
    GROUP BY
        day_of_week
)
SELECT
    day_of_week AS day,
    avg_memory_usage
FROM
    AggregatedData
ORDER BY
    avg_memory_usage ASC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Memory Bottom Day (all time / selected pod)

panels.description: All kexa memory & CPU peak alerts (All Data)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->'metadata'->>'namespace' AS "Namespace",
    Rules.name AS "Rule Name",
    Scans.created_at AS "Scan time"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}' OR Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at
DESC;

panels.title: Peak CPU & Memory Alerts (All Data)

panels.description: Scan by scan, amount of Kexa peak alerts for CPU & Memory (All Data)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.error = true) AS "Error Count",
    MAX(s.created_at) AS "Latest Created At"
FROM
    Scans s
JOIN 
    Rules r ON s.ruleId = r.ID
WHERE 
    s.error = true
    AND (r.name = '${CpuRule}' OR r.name = '${MemoryRule}')
GROUP BY 
    s.batchId
ORDER BY 
    "Latest Created At" ASC;

panels.title: Amount of peak alerts by scan (All Data)

panels.description: All Kexa alerts for Kubernetes addons, grouped by resource name and rule name.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS resourceName,
    Rules.name AS ruleName,
    MAX(Scans.created_at) AS latestScanTime
FROM
    Scans
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
JOIN
    Resources ON Scans.resourceId = Resources.ID
GROUP BY
    resourceName,
    ruleName
ORDER BY
    latestScanTime DESC;

panels.title: All Kubernetes Alerts (latest entries)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Rules
JOIN
    Providers ON Rules.providerId = Providers.ID
WHERE
    Providers.name = 'kubernetes';
list.label: CPU Usage Rule Name
list.name: CpuRule

    Providers.name = 'kubernetes';

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
        Resources.content::jsonb->'metadata'->>'namespace'='$Namespace'
ORDER BY
   Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName'
ASC;

    Resources.content::jsonb->'metadata'->>'namespace' AS "Namespace"
FROM
    Resources

list.definition:
SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS "CPU Limit Total"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    AND Scans.created_at = (
        SELECT MAX(Scans.created_at)
        FROM Scans
        JOIN Resources ON Scans.resourceId = Resources.ID
        JOIN Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
        WHERE
            Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
            AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    );
